name: The Inn at Elk River

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My Husband and I had the most wonderful, romantic, weekend getaway at the Elk River Inn. We are very discerning and the Inn was perfect. The view from the porch in front of our room was wonderful. We were greeted with cheese and crackers with fresh fruit and a glass of wine by the wonderful InnKeeper, Arya, who showed us around the Inn and helped with our choice of restaurants and made our reservation for Saturday evening. Arya also served the most tasty and beautifully served breakfast we have had in our travels. A fluffy spinach and sundried tomato omelet with real potatoes, asparagus, fresh fruit and sausage. What more could you ask for. The only suggestion would be for the owners to try a bit harder to update the decor. The rooms - while the beds were comfortable and spotlessly clean would have benefited from a few more pictures, etc. The price was reasonable and, again, the view awesome. Our favorite part was relaxing on the big porch at night and looking at the stars.
reviews.title: Wonderful romantic getaway - Ignore old posts about this Inn

reviews.text: Inn was in poor shape, room had socks behind the dresser from a previous guest. Housekeeping was poor. Innkeeper was very friendly and the morning breakfast was o.k., we expexcted more for our money! very disappointed!
reviews.title: Stay Away!
Poor Quality Inn at Elk River, Banner Elk NC
reviews.text: This Inn should not be allowed to operate. It is dirty--shower curtain was covered with mold, the throat choaking smell of candles proliferated throughout, and left underwear from a previous guest was not only disgusting but underlined the fact that no cleaning was being done. It's too expensive for this type of poor service and quality.

description: The Inn at Elk River in Banner Elk, NC is honored to have received a 2012 Trip Advisor Award of Excellence! For the past year, Trip Advisor has ranked the Inn at Elk River as the #1 B&B facility in the NC High Country Mountain region, an honor that Innkeeper Darlene Calvert works very hard to maintain. The Inn is always spotless clean and fresh. The Inn has 8 rooms with private baths and a beautiful view of the NC mountains from the deck outside each room. Four of the eight rooms have working fireplaces for cool, cozy evenings. Room rates include a full breakfast for two prepared and served fresh each morning. The Inn at Elk River is an inviting Williamsburg Inn that has been owned and operated by three couples since 1996; John and Malinda Lowery, Bill and Loretta Dodgen and Richard and Ann Miller. Come and enjoy every season in Banner Elk N.C. as The Inn at Elk River is open year round and the hospitality will surpass your expectations. Come see for yourself why The Inn at Elk River has been rated the #1 B&B in the NC mountains by TripAdvisor for the past year!
